parameters.name: Repositories
parameters.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s).full_name
| distinct tostring(repository)
| where isnotempty(repository)

parameters.name: Actors
parameters.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend actor = todynamic(sender_s).login
| distinct tostring(actor)
| where isnotempty(actor)

content.query:
let RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create')
| extend EventType='Dependabot Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)                     
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| extend Severity = tostring(alert.severity)
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| project EventType, Severity;
let CodeScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend EventType='Code Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Severity = tostring(alert.rule.security_severity_level)
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where isnotempty(Severity) 
| project EventType, Severity;
let SecretScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend EventType='Secret Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| extend Severity = "high"
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| project EventType, Severity;
union withsource="AllEvents" RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts, CodeScanningAlerts, SecretScanningAlerts
|summarize  Count = count() by tostring(Severity)
content.title: Open Alerts By Severity

content.query:
let RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create')
| extend EventType='Dependabot Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s) 
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)   
| extend Repository = repo.full_name               
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| extend Severity = tostring(alert.severity)
| where Severity in ({Severity});
let CodeScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend EventType='Code Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)   
| extend Repository = repo.full_name                 
| extend Severity = alert.rule.security_severity_level
| extend Severity = tostring(alert.rule.security_severity_level)
| where Severity in ({Severity});
let SecretScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend EventType='Secret Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend Repository = repo.full_name                 
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| extend Severity = "high"
| where Severity in ({Severity});
union withsource="AllEvents" RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts, CodeScanningAlerts, SecretScanningAlerts
|summarize  Count = count() by tostring(Repository)
content.title: Open Alerts by Repository

content.query:
let RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create')
| extend EventType='Dependabot Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)                     
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| extend Severity = alert.severity
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| project EventType, Severity;
let CodeScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend EventType='Code Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Severity = alert.rule.security_severity_level
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| project EventType, Severity;
let SecretScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend EventType='Secret Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| extend Severity = "High"
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| project EventType, Severity;
union withsource="AllEvents" RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts, CodeScanningAlerts, SecretScanningAlerts
|summarize  Count = count() by tostring(EventType)
content.title: Open Alerts by Type

content.query:
let RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('dismiss', 'resolve')
| extend EventType='Dependabot Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s) 
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)   
| extend Repository = repo.full_name               
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| extend Severity = tostring(alert.severity)
| where Severity in ({Severity});
let CodeScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('closed_by_user', 'fixed') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend EventType='Code Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)   
| extend Repository = repo.full_name                 
| extend Severity = alert.rule.security_severity_level
| where Severity in ({Severity});
let SecretScanningAlerts = githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolved')
| extend EventType='Secret Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend Repository = repo.full_name                 
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| extend Severity = "high"
| where Severity in ({Severity});
union withsource="AllEvents" RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts, CodeScanningAlerts, SecretScanningAlerts
| count
content.title: Resolved Alert Count

content.query:
let RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts = 
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create', 'dismiss', 'resolve')
| extend EventType='Dependabot Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)                     
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| extend Severity = alert.severity
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)   
| extend Repository = repo.full_name 
| extend id = alert.ghsa_id  
| extend Status = action_s
| extend Reason = alert.affected_package_name
| extend Created_at = alert.created_at
| extend Number = alert.number
| extend Age = now() - todatetime(Created_at) 
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
|project Repository, Reason, id, EventType, tostring(Severity), Status, Created_at, Number, format_timespan(Age, 'dd:hh:mm:ss');
let CodeScanningAlerts =
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', 'reopened_by_user', 'closed_by_user', 'fixed', 'appeared_in_branch', 'reopened') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend EventType='Code Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Severity = alert.rule.security_severity_level
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)   
| extend Repository = repo.full_name 
| extend Reason = alert.rule.name
| extend id = alert.rule.id
| extend Severity = alert.rule.security_severity_level
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| extend Status = action_s
| extend Created_at = alert.created_at
| extend Number = alert.number
| where isnotempty(Severity) 
| extend Age = now() - todatetime(Created_at)
|project Repository, Reason, id, EventType, tostring(Severity), Status, Created_at, Number, format_timespan(Age, 'dd:hh:mm:ss');
let SecretScanningAlerts = 
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', 'resolved', 'reopened')
| extend EventType='Secret Scanning Alert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend Repository = repo.full_name 
| extend Severity = "high"
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| extend Reason = alert.secret_type 
| extend id = alert.number
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| extend Status = action_s
| extend Created_at = alert.created_at
| extend Number = alert.number
| extend Age = now() - todatetime(Created_at)
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| project Repository, Reason, id, EventType, tostring(Severity), Status, Created_at, Number, format_timespan(Age, 'dd:hh:mm:ss');
union withsource="AllEvents" RepositoryVulnerabilityAlerts, CodeScanningAlerts, SecretScanningAlerts
content.title: Alert Details

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('closed_by_user', 'fixed') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend url  = alert.url
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repository = repo.name
| extend created_at = alert.created_at
| extend resolved_at = alert.fixed_at
| extend day = todatetime(resolved_at) - todatetime(created_at)
| summarize format_timespan(avg(day), 'dd:hh:mm:ss')
content.title: Mean Time to Resolution (dd:hh:mm:ss)

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend Status = action_s
| count
content.title: Created

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('fixed') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend Status = action_s
| count
content.title: Fixed

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('reopened') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend Status = action_s
| count
content.title: Reopened

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', "fixed") and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| summarize event_count=count() by tostring(action_s), bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: Alert Found/Fixed Ratio

content.query:
let GithubPushes = githubscanaudit_CL
| extend EventType='Push'
| extend status = todynamic(action_s)
| extend commit = todynamic(commits_s)[0]
| extend added = commit.added
| extend modified = commit.modified
| extend removed = commit.removed
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories})
| where isnotempty(modified[0]) or isnotempty(added[0]);
let CodeScanningAlerts = 
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', 'reopened') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend EventType='Code Scanning Alert';
union withsource="AllEvents" CodeScanningAlerts, GithubPushes
| summarize event_count=count() by EventType, bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: Commit/Alert Ratio

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', "appeared_in_branch") and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Tool = alert.tool.name
| project TimeGenerated, Tool
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Tool), bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: New Alerts by Tool

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('closed_by_user', 'fixed') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend URL  = alert.html_url
| extend tool = alert.tool.name
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repository = repo.name
| extend created_at = alert.created_at
| extend resolved_at = alert.fixed_at
| extend Time_To_Resolution = format_timespan(todatetime(resolved_at) - todatetime(created_at), 'dd:hh:mm:ss')
| project repository, URL, tool, created_at, resolved_at, Time_To_Resolution
content.title: Fixed Alerts

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', 'reopened_by_user', 'reopened') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
|extend repository = repo.full_name
| extend severity = alert.rule.security_severity_level
| where isnotempty(severity)
| summarize Total=count(severity), Critical=countif(severity=='critical'), High=countif(severity=='high'), Medium=countif(severity=='medium'), Low=countif(severity=='low') by tostring(repository)
content.title: Alerts by Severity

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', 'reopened') and isnotempty(commit_oid_s)
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend repo = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend Tool = tostring(alert.tool.name)
| extend Repository = repo.full_name
| project Repository, Tool
| evaluate pivot(tostring(Tool))
| order by tostring(Repository) asc
content.title: Alerts by Repo

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolved')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| extend created_at = alert.created_at
| extend resolved_at = alert.resolved_at
| extend day = todatetime(resolved_at) - todatetime(created_at)
| summarize format_timespan(avg(day), 'dd:hh:mm:ss')
content.title: Mean Time to Resolution (dd:hh:mm:ss)

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| extend actor = todynamic(sender_s)
| extend actorname = actor.login
| where actorname in ({Actors})
| count
content.title: Found Secrets

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolved')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| count
content.title: Fixed Secrets

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(alertSecretType)
content.title: Secrets by Type

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| extend  repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(repositoryfullname)
content.title: Secrets by Repository

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created', 'resolved')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertSecretType = alert.secret_type
| where isnotempty(alertSecretType)
| summarize Count = count() by  bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), action_s
content.title: Secrets Found/Fixed Ratio

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolved')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Secret_Type = alert.secret_type
| extend Repository = todynamic(repository_s).full_name
| extend Organization = todynamic(organization_s).login
| extend Created_at = alert.created_at
| extend Resolved_at = alert.resolved_at
| extend Time_to_Resolution= format_timespan(todatetime(Resolved_at) - todatetime(Created_at), 'dd:hh:mm:ss' )
| extend Resolution = case(isnotnull(alert.resolution), alert.resolution, "Null") 
| extend URL = todynamic(repository_s).url       
| where isnotempty(Secret_Type)
|project Secret_Type, Organization, Repository, Resolution, Time_to_Resolution
content.title: Fixed Secrets

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('created')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Secret_Type = alert.secret_type
| extend Repository = todynamic(repository_s).full_name
| extend Organization = todynamic(organization_s).login
| extend Created_at = alert.created_at
| extend URL = alert.html_url       
| where isnotempty(Secret_Type)
| project tostring(Secret_Type), tostring(Organization), tostring(Repository), tostring(URL), tostring(Created_at)
content.title: Found Secrets

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolve')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend created_at = alert.created_at 
| extend resolved_at = alert.fixed_at
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| extend day = todatetime(resolved_at) - todatetime(created_at)
| summarize format_timespan(avg(day), 'dd:hh:mm:ss')
content.title: Mean Time to Resolution (dd:hh:mm:ss)

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Status = action_s
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| count
content.title: Created

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolve')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Status = action_s
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| count
content.title: Resolved

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('dismiss')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Status = action_s
| extend alertexternalidentifier= alert.external_identifier
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| count
content.title: Dismissed

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create', 'dismiss', 'resolve')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertexternalidentifier = alert.external_identifier   
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(action_s), bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: Alert Found/Fixed Ratio

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create')
| extend EventType='RepositoryVulnerabilityAlert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertexternalidentifier = alert.external_identifier  
| extend Severity = alert.severity
| extend Repository = todynamic(repository_s).full_name
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Repository)
content.title: Vulnerabilities by Repo

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('create')
| extend EventType='RepositoryVulnerabilityAlert'
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend alertexternalidentifier = alert.external_identifier  
| extend Severity = alert.severity
| extend Repository = todynamic(repository_s).full_name
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Severity),  bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: New Alerts by Severity

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and action_s in ('resolve', 'dismiss')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
|extend Action = todynamic(action_s)
| extend alertexternalidentifier = alert.external_identifier  
| extend Severity = alert.severity
| extend repo =  todynamic(repository_s)
| extend Alert_URL = alert.external_reference
| extend Repository = repo.full_name
| extend created_at = alert.created_at
| extend resolved_at = case(isnotnull(alert.fixed_at), alert.fixed_at, alert.dismissed_at)
| extend Time_to_Resolution = format_timespan(todatetime(resolved_at) - todatetime(created_at), 'dd:hh:mm:ss')
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| project Action, Repository, Severity, Alert_URL, Time_to_Resolution
content.title: Fixed Alerts

content.query:
githubscanaudit_CL 
| extend repository = todynamic(repository_s)
| extend repositoryfullname = repository.full_name
| where repositoryfullname in ({Repositories}) and  action_s in ('create')
| extend alert = todynamic(alert_s)
| extend Action = todynamic(action_s)
| extend alertexternalidentifier = alert.external_identifier  
| extend Severity = alert.severity
| extend repo =  todynamic(repository_s)
| extend Alert_URL = alert.external_reference
| extend Repository = repo.full_name
| extend created_at = alert.created_at
| extend resolved_at = alert.fixed_at
| extend Time_to_Resolution = todatetime(resolved_at) - todatetime(created_at)
| where isnotempty(alertexternalidentifier)
| summarize Total=count(Severity), Critical=countif(Severity=='critical'), High=countif(Severity=='high'), Medium=countif(Severity=='moderate'), Low=countif(Severity=='low') by tostring(Repository)
content.title: Alerts by Repo
